modules.name: PolyCopy10
modules.description: It is channel multiplier with 10 mono repeated inputs and a polyphonic output

modules.name: PokeMe Sequencer
modules.description: Not so simple

modules.name: PolyCopy16
modules.description: It is channel multiplier with 16 mono repeated inputs and a polyphonic output

modules.name: tXOr Pattern Generator
modules.description: A simple exclusive disjunction you need. Three knobs acting as clock division and the internal calculation send only excludive pulses to the output.

modules.name: Multiknob Fix Voltages
modules.description: Quad manual module to provide fix voltages

modules.name: Poly Exploder 10
modules.description: It splits 10 channels of the polyphonic input. Yes, some channels will be lost.

modules.name: Poly Exploder 8
modules.description: It splits 8 channels of the polyphonic input. Yes, some channels will be lost but youcan select between 1-8 or 8-16 channels to allow the 2HP width.

modules.name: Sequential Switch Programmer 5
modules.description: Four knobs define which of the five inputs is forwarded as a monophonic signal.

modules.name: tHex Trigger Sequencer
modules.description: Four knobs allows you to dial the iconic patterns for your tune

modules.name: Sequential Switch Programmer 16
modules.description: Four knobs to choose from the channels of a polyphonic input

modules.name: Slide6 Fix Voltages
modules.description: Manual module to provide fix voltages within defined ranges

modules.name: Slide16 Fix Voltages and Sequencer
modules.description: Provides 16 fix voltages in a polyphonic out cable and allows also to loop through them as a sequencer

modules.name: Trigger Precision 1
modules.description: Trigger randomizer

modules.name: Trigger Precision 2
modules.description: Trigger randomizer

modules.name: Trigger Precision 6
modules.description: Trigger randomizer

modules.name: 9Lives
modules.description: Trigger sequencer for complex fills

modules.name: Random Voltage 10
modules.description: Provides 10 lovely random voltages in the 0V-10V range for a trigger

modules.name: Random Voltage 8
modules.description: Provides 8 lovely random voltages in with adjustable range for a trigger

modules.name: Channel Selector 6
modules.description: A module to select six of your favorite channels from a polyphonic input

modules.name: Channel Selector 8
modules.description: A module to select eight of your favorite channels from a polyphonic input

modules.name: Enveloop
modules.description: Envelope generator with VCA

modules.name: Celesta Sequencer
modules.description: Celestial spheres sequencer as proposed by Andre_M on the VCV Community forum

modules.name: Celei Sequencer
modules.description: Celei is a simple 8 step CV sequencer

modules.name: Vulcan Trigger Sequencer
modules.description: Simple 8-track 16-step trigger sequencer

modules.name: PushMeSeq Trigger Sequencer
modules.description: Variable trigger sequencer in  4HP

modules.name: PushmeMore Trigger Expander
modules.description: Expander module for PushmeSeq

modules.name: RotaTrig
modules.description: Router to send the input somewhere

modules.name: NearMess Mixer
modules.description: An almost passive mixer with 2 inputs and 9 outputs

modules.name: NearMix Mixer
modules.description: An almost passive mixer with 9 inputs and 2 outputs

modules.name: SaveMeMono
modules.description: Saving and replaying a sequence of voltages

modules.name: SaveMeMore

modules.description: Saving and replaying a sequence of voltages

modules.name: Sequin
modules.description: Queen of Sequencers

modules.name: QuantET

modules.name: Quant12
modules.description: Traditional monophonic quantizer transpose and trigger inputs

modules.name: FromTo
modules.description: Provides equally distributed control voltages

modules.name: Sheep Random Sequencer
modules.description: Step voltage generator based on predefined map and a single reading head. (Read: a predefined field with a single eating sheep.)

modules.name: SheepMore Expander
modules.description: Expander module for the Sheep Random Sequencer with various outputs.

modules.name: Euclk
modules.description: Euphoric euclidean clock generator and sequencer

modules.name: Euclkid Expander
modules.description: Euphoric euclidean expander for Euclk sequencer

modules.name: Ticklet Clock Divider
modules.description: A simple clock divider

modules.name: RouteSeq
modules.description: It's a kind of sequencer with clock division on every step and polyphonic input

modules.name: Organic
modules.description: A sequencer with an inprobable route

modules.name: Rubber
modules.description: A 2HP module with various motors
